content:
On Wednesday in the afternoon, the enemy used to blow to Nikolaev, probably the ballistic missile "Iskander-M".

About thisreportedDefense forces of South of Ukraine.

"The enemy continues to use different types of rocket weapons, terrorizing the regions of Ukraine," the message reads.

It is noted that the impact is damaged by an industrial facility, injured among the employees of the enterprise.

As reported by the Armyinform, as a result of Russian blow to Nikolaev on WednesdayaffectedSix people.
title: Nikolaev rocket firing: The Russians hit the Isandard on the enterprise
description: This was reported by the defense forces of southern Ukraine. “The enemy continues to apply different ...
author: Army Inform
